review: Perfect after a bad work day.
A bit too strong for my taste, but still good.

This particular drink was suprisingly good at removing any sense of inhibition from me. Didn't come to my senses until after I drove my Tesla full speed over a hill in San Fransisco and started sinking into the bay. 10/10.
One sip of this baby and you'll feel more focused than a hawk on adderall. A bit too sweet, 8/10.
Just the right blend of sweet and savory concoctions, perfect for small get-togethers!
A perfect Saturday sunset sipper! My husband and I love it!
Not a big fan, a bit too tart.
Almost enough to make me forget about the atrocities. Almost.
A guy I knew that went to prison said this was his go-to drink. I now understand why he was in prison.
Trying to forget? This is the drink for you. Trying to remember? This is the drink for you. Not trying to do either? This is definitely the drink for you.
